name: KOLOR WARS - DEMO
description:
KOLOR WARS - DEMOONLY FOR PC

Color the platforms, shoot monsters and enemies, grab coins and win in 30 seconds!

Who colors multiple platforms wins!

Gamemode: LOCAL

PL1 COMMANDS:

-Use WASD to move.

-Use spacebar to shoot.

PL2 COMMANDS:

-Use arrow keys to move.

-Use ctrl to shoot.

PS: sorry if I only programmed a local mode: I was limited by the free version of C2. I hope you like it anyway!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

CREDITS:

Code: Emanuele Alfieri

Graphics: Giada Alfieri
